pageProduct.name: Scholl Eulactol Foot Heel Balm 200g - Rough Dry or Cracked Skin
pageProduct.description:
Information

Cracked heels occur when the thick skin on the sole of the foot becomes dry and is more prone to cracking. Eulactol Heel Balm Gold is a moisturising balm that softens and hydrates the skin. It effectively restores rough, dry and cracked skin.

Smoothes, softens and hydrates the skin on the heel of the foot

Eulactol Heel Balm has been dermatologically tested

Works in 7 days with visible results in just 3 days

Clean and dry feet

Smooth product onto the heel of the foot

Massage product into the heel of the foot until fully absorbed

Apply twice daily and continue to use as necessary to maintain condition

General Information

Scholl Eulactol Cracked Heel Balm Gold can effectively restore rough, dry and cracked skin.

Scholl Eulactol Cracked Heel Balm Gold 200g works in 7 days with visible results in 3 days.




3x Smooths. Softens. Hydrates.




No. 1 Heel Balm brand in Australia and New Zealand (Nielsen annual sales data).

Size: 200g

Skin Type: Dry

Skin Condition: Rough Texture

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to open, bleeding or infected cracks. If local irritation or rash occurs discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Urea, Lanolin, Petrolatum, Dodecyl Oleate, Microcrystalline Wax, Dicocoyl Pentaerythrityl Distearyl Citrate, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Oleate, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Aluminium Distearate, Triethanolamine, Citric Acid, Propyl Gallate, BHA, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Fragrance.

Directions

Apply twice daily to clean, towel dried skin. Smooth onto feet and massage in until fully absorbed. Once the skin is restored, continue to use as necessary, to maintain condition.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Scholl and diabetes.
Please seek advice before use if you have diabetes as your foot condition may require treatment by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
